company: Club del Abuelo elderly care home
description: Mini-Mental State Exam application tool built on React, Node, Express & MySQL stack. Prototype proposal developed in SWE course for the Club del Abuelo elderly care home in Zapopan, México.

company: Instituto Tecnológico y de Estudios Superiores de Monterrey, Campus Guadalajara
description: Collaborator in the Inter-American Development Bank's fAIr LAC initiative research project on school dropout. Automated data cleaning and text mining in Python, researched and implemented NLP algorithms, documented insights for analysis, publishing and use by the Jalisco state government.
Middle, high school and college level lessons on calculus, algebra, physics and logic.
